customFiles.html:
Timezone: 
<select (change)="changeTimezone($event)">
  @for (tz of timezones; track tz.id) {
    <option [value]="tz.id">{{tz.id}}</option>
  }
</select>
<luzmo-viz-item
  type="line-chart"
  [authKey]="authKey"
  [authToken]="authToken"
  [dashboardId]="dashboardId"
  [itemId]="itemId"
  [options]="options"
  style="max-width:800px; height:400px;"
></luzmo-viz-item>
